archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Swindon Finances Databases
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
These are running the Swindon finance process and supporting inter-business charges with RM and Parcelforce and consist of a number of databases:
dbMEInvoices.mdb dbMEItemHistory.mdb dbMEItemMaster.mdb dbMEKopOrder.mdb dbMEDownload2K.mdb Invoice File.mdb Main Stock Valuation.mdb.
Four Galaxy files feed the top four databases and then a number of activities and macros are used with the rest creating excel reports for various people and a balance against Galaxy
